name: ALIEN (Kosm)
description: A story about a curious group of Aliens called the "Glorp" who have crash-landed onto earth accidentally - sparking the curiosity of a young boy named Kentaro. A witty adventure ensues... Please enjoy "A L I E N" and don't be shy to leave me any feedback. Finally, check out my work on Instagram at @kosm_ofthedeep! I create strange visuals and music, as well as poetry and photography. Enjoy your day (or night), H U M A N S.
